metadata.description: Message to Major General Basilio Valdes from Brigadier General Manuel Roxas requesting the reversion of the latter to inactive status due to his election as member of the Philippine Senate
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; World War II; Military; official papers; President Manuel Roxas
metadata.title: Message to Major General Basilio Valdes from Brigadier General Manuel Roxas requesting the reversion of the latter to inactive status due to his election as member of the Philippine Senate
